label: Manage Microsoft Dynamics CRM components and the product catalog (24%)

skills.label: Manage Dynamics CRM sales management components
items: Create, maintain, and use sales literature

skills.label: Manage the product catalog
items: Understand the role of the product catalog and price lists

skills.label: Manage leads
items: Understand the role of lead and opportunity records
Understand the lead to the opportunity process flow
Use the lead to the opportunity process form and the process ribbon

skills.label: Manage opportunities
items: Add a contact to an opportunity

skills.label: Manage the sales order process
items: Create and add write-in products and opportunities
Select alternate price lists for opportunities
Understand the process of the quotes life cycle
Convert quotes to orders and convert orders to invoices

label: Manage metrics and perform sales analysis (23%)

skills.label: Manage metrics and goals
items: Create and recalculate parent and child goal records

skills.label: Perform sales analysis
items: Export sales information to microsoft excel
Work with system charts from an opportunity list
Work with microsoft power bi dashboards

label: Integrate Microsoft Dynamics CRM with other products (22%)

skills.label: Configure email integration
items: Configure server settings, server profiles, and mailbox configurations
Use the dynamics crm app for outlook

skills.label: Configure collaboration
items: Use skype and skype for business with dynamics crm
Use microsoft yammer with dynamics crm
Use office groups with dynamics crm

skills.label: Configure Office productivity
items: Visualize data with excel and power bi to create an immersive experience
